<p class=box>
[UI](#ui-vi-wi) = eastward component of the horizontal wind   
[VI](#ui-vi-wi) = northward component of the horizontal wind  
atan2 = 4-quadrant arc-tangent function producing output in radians
from -$\pi$ to $\pi$  
$C_{rd}$ = conversion factor, radians to degrees, = 180/$\pi$ [units: $^{\circ}\,/\,\mathrm{radian}$]  
</p><p class=box2>
\begin{align}
\mathrm{WS} = & \sqrt{\mathrm{\{UI\}}^{2}+\{\mathrm{VI\}}^{2}}(\#eq:WS)\\
\mathrm{WD} = & C_{rd}\mathrm{\,atan2(\{UI\},\,\{VI\})}+180^{\circ}  
(\#eq:WD)
\end{align}
</p>
